mapper.select: SELECT saller_id, saller_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SALLER ORDER BY saller_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_SALLER (saller_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active) VALUES (#{sellerName}, #{contactInfo}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE MASTER_SALLER SET saller_name = #{sellerName}, contact_info = #{contactInfo}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE saller_id = #{sellerId}
